objects.text:
Bold Nacho Flavor
Crunchy Corn Chips
Perfect For Parties
Shareable Snack

product_details.description: Product Description          The chip that packs a flavorful punch with the classic crunch. Boldly seasoned with three cheeses, tomatoes, onions and a savory blend of spices. Indulge yourself or share with large gatherings.             Manufacturer Contact Information          Plano, Tx 75024-4099 Pack of 64, 1.75 ounce large single serving bags (total of 112 ounces) Doritos tortilla chips with classic nacho cheese flavor Made of whole corn; flavorings feature real cheddar cheese Crunchy straight from the bag or after scooping up dip or salsa Ships in Certified Frustration Free Packaging Brand - Doritos ** Flavor - Nacho Cheese ** Unit Count - 112.0 Ounce ** Number of Items - 64 ** Type - Tortilla Chip **

banner_details:
The banner features a bold and modern layout with a strong promotional appeal. A large headline (`heading`) in white occupies the top-left with a subheading (`subheading`) just below in bright yellow. Product benefits are detailed in a white list format (`description`), flanked by a row of dotted yellow accents and a horizontal line element (`decorative`) to separate sections. The central focus of the design is the product image (`product_image`), shown prominently on the right over a dynamic background featuring angular and rotated shapes in deep red, orange, black, and gold overlays. A large white price tag (`price`) grabs attention in the bottom left corner. A bright yellow CTA button (`cta_background`) with black text (`cta`) encourages interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Red: #C00000
- Orange: #FF6600
- Gold/Yellow: #FFD700
- White: #FFFFFF
- Black: #000000
product_color: The product image uses a bold and dynamic color palette to convey intensity and flavor. Dominated by a fiery red background (#C8102E), the packaging instantly grabs attention and suggests heat and excitement. The Doritos logo is highlighted with a sharp contrast of black (#000000) and white (#FFFFFF) for impact, while the orange and yellow gradient on the chips (#F5A623, #F8E71C) reinforces the nacho cheese flavor. These warm tones are expertly blended to maintain vibrancy without overpowering each other. The gradient accent around the triangle in the logo uses a glowing orange (#FF6F00) which further enhances visual appeal and brand energy.
